attributes.comment:
I oppose raising the adoption related document fees by the proposed amounts. I
suggest a small fee increase of 5% and an increase in the length of time that the I-
600A and fingerprints are valid for both new applications and existing documents.

The current international timelines for adoption are increasing. We recently had to
have our fingerprints redone requiring an additional fee. Our I-600A most likely will
also need to be updated with an additional fee submitted.

A modest increase in fees and an increase in the timeframe these documents are
valid would assist adoptive parents financially and reduce your agency's related
workload.

Thank you for for considering my comments.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
